stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ip Victoria

review: This app must be for the rich. 11 dollars for some breakfast burritos from 3 minutes down the road. Says "0$ DELIVERY FEE" front and center. Tries to hide the fine print on a LATER page that says it only applies to orders of 15 or higher. The app then tries to actively hide the total from you, so you wont notice that your 11 dollar order is now a 24 dollar order because 5 dollar delivery fee, 5 dollars for "taxes and other fees" like the F you fee I guess, dunno, it doesnt tell you. And then tip
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Bell Idrael

review: There are too many ad notifications. Every day, I keep getting notifications about promotions and now emails, SEVERAL TIMES A DAY. It's harassment! Especially since at the moment I'M BROKE! So unless it's for free food, just tell me how to make it stop, or I'm gonna uninstall.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: MG

review: Easy to use the app. Good range of places to order from. Delivery fees usually less than local pizza places. Quick refund for missing or damaged items. Uber membership does save money if ordering a few times per month.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Narelle Lewis

review: This place sucks to the fact that I was trying to cancel my order and I was unable to compare to doordash which I'm able to cancel my order if needs to be but I've never had a problem for doordash. The problem is that my order from bnm's barbecue is from Northfield in miles I live in Cleveland Heights. My food is going to be extremely cold and I try to let them know this and my order be cancelled was refused. I would never order from ubereats again. I have not ordered from them for three years.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Cecilia Foreman

review: Extremely disappointed by the support. During a delivery I was waiting the delivery person by the door and I saw him dropping the bag with food. He completed the order in his app without a photo that they usually take and gave the feedback that he couldn't reach us. He also said to ask for a refund as we didn't receive the order. We contacted support providing photo (of the food on the floor and the delivery person) and they said we can't get a refund.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Golden Jr

review: Ordered McDelivery and this was fulfilled by ubereats. Did not receive my order. Told by customer support that the driver had attempted to contact me multiple times so I was not entitled to a refund. One phone call and that was after I rang him asking where my food was and all he did was just say hello down the phone repeatedly. I texted him to confirm my address with no reply. Used ubereats many times without problems. If you have a problem then the customer service is frankly shocking.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Daniel Norman

review: We I live we have three hungry jacks within 20mins of them. One is further then the other but the app thinks the closer one is to far but the further one I can order from. Then I watch the driver drive past the closer one. Very annoying but good app works well besides that.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Matthew Grouios

review: I had really bad experience. I did order, for some reason I cancelled within a minute and they charged me $65 as cancellation fees, I called costumer support she told me that she's not able to do refund process and told that she'll call restaurant to inform to deliver cancelled order with that she asked me to put new order and I only got new order. I didn't get refund either another order! I called again Costumer support they told me that they can't do anything!!!This is ridiculous.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: KASHYAP AKBARI

review: This app is often functional, but there are a few show-stopping bugs which are painfully frustrating. If your card declines, retrying won't succeed for around 12 hours, even after you transfer enough money, which is exceedingly annoying.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Miguel Guthridge

review: Easy to use app and even tho there has been a couple mishaps with either the restaurant forgetting an item, or the time 1 of my order was never delivered, UE Customer Service has been extremely helpful with providing a solution. The amount of time I use the app is worth paying the monthly fee for a their service.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Ever Rodriguez

review: I use Uber eats a lot when I'm depressed or sick and it's great for that, but the design of the app and user experience is pretty subpar. I honestly believe they don't have the ability to improve this app not because it's good but because they are bad.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Wilfred Young

review: Ordered a 45 dollar order the order was delivered to the wrong address even though the correct address was clearly started on the order information. Due to the failure of the driver and deliverer. Then when I called customer service they refused to refund my order because of their system and how it couldn't differentiate the two addresses. So with no food, no refund Uber eats has taken my money. Would not recommend. Do better Uber Eats
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Michael Grant

review: Terrible app , there is no actual human you can contact when the driver simply doesn't deliver the food but says he did . Driver stood multiple blocks away and said I am outside then after 7 minutes said couldn't reach customer and order was cancelled and I was charged for it . With no way to contact anyone and no options in the useless bot . What kind of app is this!!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: life tourist

review: This is a disappointing review to have write as the service before had been good. I scheduled an order and a hold for 24 pounds was put on my card. Upon receipt of delivery, without my consent, that hold was reversed and a hold was put for 52 pounds for the same items. I queried this and was told not to worry, asked for items to be returned. They ignored and charged 52 pounds FOR THE SAME ITEMS THAT HAD BEEN 24 POUNDS. Service ignored have charged an extra 28 pounds with no means to challenge
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Thomas Hannah

review: Be aware looks like they are scaming now. They randomly charge extra money and when you contact their Support. They just redirect you to the email which you will never receive. So be aware and cross check your payments. They have charged me extra 2 times.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Shah Faisal Ahmad

review: The app doesn't work. I try to add things to my cart and it doesn't add them. I am an uber one member and it says promos apply but I cant add them. It also sometimes just kicks me out. Losing patience and going to cancel and move to Mr D I dont have time to struggle
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Kris Topher

review: I have been encountering many problems with this app as of lately, recently when I try to claim a promotion it just says opps, promotion not available with no reason that I could find as to why. in the last year to it feels like all orders have something wrong about them and can never be quite right. This is quite sad as I used to really enjoy this app and even pay for the premium version, but in it's current state it's pretty unusable I suggest getting food yourself or using another app.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: burning Kabutops

review: My many experiences with UberEATS have been exceptional except for one. Two of the items that I ordered were not available but no one attempted to get in touch with me about a substitution, and I was still charged for the items.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Katherine Thomas

review: 90% of the time its brilliant, just sometimes food or items are missing which is annoying. But uber does help you out for this, but when you have a group of friends round and and item or a meal is missing like i say it is annoying. 👍🏽 👍🏽
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Aaron Harris

review: I live really far from any restaurants at the moment, and I also just recently had my transmission go out on my car so I'm very grateful to Uber eats because there's lots of times I'm able to get delicious meals for my family I have three children who are always grateful and we're able to treat ourselves they have so many great promos and are able to help with groceries in an emergency like when there was a hurricane scare. I'm able to get everything I need! Love this app 💕
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: muvaa of3

review: The worst customer support possible. I was made to wait for an hour, the delivery person finally had my order, and then it was cancelled. I was told by customer service that the refund will take 3-5 business days. They have no credits system, nor do they recompense for harassment. Yes, I will stick to Doordash.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Dipanjan Maitra

review: I ordered a dish that was not the correct one. I received $2 in credit, but when I tried to talk to support, they said it's resolved with a refund. $2 in credit is not a refund! So disappointing! This is my second time receiving the wrong dish. The first time, they gave me $5 back for a dish around $30. What happened to you Uber Eats?
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sal

review: Uber eats ui is lazy and sloppy because it keeps hiding the important information way below the file, information like select payment method. Either put that at the top or put it on a separate screen. Otherwise people will uninstall the app because it is too frustrating always failing to pay.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Adrian Smith

review: Uber Eats is a great blessing to me, as my health has prevented me from cooking for myself and from being able to go out for meals. Though my diet is very limited due to food allergies, there are a few restaurants that I can order from regularly, and I know that my meal will be safe and will arrive quickly. (And when something does go wrong, Uber is quick to offer a solution, which is also great.) I am so grateful to live in a time where this technology is available!
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Patricia Hamel

review: My wife got a gift card for Uber Eats as we just had a baby. Using the app we were delivered a totally wrong order and the driver left immediately after leaving the food at the door. Tried following the steps in the app to fix a wrong order and the app just faulted and did not allow photo uploads. Option to contact the driver also failed. After 45 minutes trying the faulty app my wife submitted a query on her computer and finally got a refund. You know what works? Ordering through a restaurant.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ryan Evans

review: I am/ was an Uber one membership user. Latest arrival, an estimate that keeps on changing when the order is delayed. What's the point of having it named Latest when you can still change it to a later time. I have a rating of 4.98 on Uber as a customer. Technically I should be given discounts on my rides. However I am charged more than my friends who are not even paying for Uber 1 membership. Uber is scamming me of the benefits it provides in Uber eats. I finally cancelled my subscription.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: D T

review: Uber eats it's a good app ,don't get me wrong when I started using it What happened was they gave me a promo that was non applicable because when I went to order it took me back to the checkout page what I didn't notice was that my promo didn't get applied so I thought it was a technical glitch and I pressed order . To realise that they took the full amount.... long story short it scamed by making think I had a promo
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Silindokuhle Masuku

review: This is only a spam app to flood you with ads. Like many said, if something goes wrong, you have no one to contact. Maps awful, service awful with drivers sent to the wrong address, get something better. It's not worth the fees they steal on each service!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Pedro Matos Rito

review: 0 stars. No customer service for things that really matter. Almost scammed by restaurants on the app. No help received when i had a family to feed. Can't afford to order again without the refund. Customer service brushed it off and rudely ended a chat without finishing the conversation. Uber eats used to be an amazing app. Now as a delivery partner i am highly disappointed i participated in working for a company with no regards to their own delivery partners complaints and customers.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Bagz

review: Don't use these deceptive thieves! Deleted this app & closed my account cos even if you cancel an order, there is every chance they will keep your hard-earned money cos you didn't tell them within 48 hours that you never got refunded as if you have to babysit them to do the right thing!! 🖕 If I cancelled an order, I expect you to do the right thing & not keep my goddamn money. I found out only after getting my credit card statement 🤦‍♀️ NEVER AGAIN!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Margarita M (immargarita)

review: Easy to use, and tends to work seamlessly most of the time, though reporting a problem with an order would be easier if there was a general 'other issues' category as sometimes the options don't reflect the issue you need to resolve.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Ruth Adele

review: . I haven't really come across many ads. The service is convenient and good but food ratings need to be updated frequently to better reflect accuracy of quality (flavour, texture, freshness). I like Uber eats in general. Drivers are efficient and friendly however they tend not to look at the street names so we have experienced a number of non deliveries but for those who do show up -recommended. It's about the same as door dash
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: N Charleton

review: Dominos order was incorrectly placed to be ordered outside of vicinity of our current location. I was in Colorado and the order was being sent to Indiana. No, verification was done to confirm that this order was being delivered to the correct location. The app gave a warning, but then pushed through the order anyway. I was not refunded for my order that I cancelled within 2 minutes of placing the order, because I didn't notify the help desk within 48 hours, it was 72 hours.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: ryan hanks

review: Very convenient and has good promotions. I've had a couple of experiences where things have gone wrong mind, like when only half of my products arrived and I had to chase my refund. UberEats was good with resolving the issue, though. Other than that, very useful, with good customer service.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Crystal Peters

review: I'm not a fan of the extra charges outside of the delivery fee to the driver and at times I can't a refund or replacement of an item. If the driver or the restaurant messed up my order they should be held liable every single time not sometimes and then customer service reps get disrespectful trying to make it seem like you're lying to get a free meal or item. All of the issues with the fees and customer service needs to be done better as well as with more respect.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Tifa M

review: Efficient user-friendly app and service that has clearly been refined over its lifetime to be improved based on user feedback. The service does an excellent job of protecting the end-user and customer in the event of things going wrong. Definitely my app of preference for food delivery.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Bradley Reckless

review: I ordered a French dip sandwich a small drink that they charged me almost $20 for. The order was 20 minutes late, sandwich cold, the main ingredients was missing and the drink was watered down. So I contacted customer support they hook me up with $2 off oh boy. There's no way to contact him at all other than just to send a a pre-programmed message off their message board. Never use an ubereats again ever doordash from here on out
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Fox Trot

review: Food and driver were clearly on the other side of town when my meal was registered as delivered. It all took my money anyway. No easy way to complain, report or get a refund through the app. Disgraceful all round from Uber, don't bother with this app plenty of other food apps out there that don't hide away from their mistakes.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Fkellig 92

review: Since I've used this app I've never been disappointed at all ,it's very convenient and when there are mistakes Uber does a really amazing communication ...to show that they care and they value me as their external guests ...I would recommend it to everyone interested it's a place or platform to use busy or not DANKO UBER
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Inga Mbita

review: My experience has been 75 percent of time good. They need to have a way to adjust the dots on the map so the drivers will know the correct place to bring your food. When i put my address in it shows the street apartments and i stay in the back. Also some of the drivers say they delivered food when they didn't and expected to still get a tip ..
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Latonya M

review: Absolute scammers, horrible customer service. These thieves let old order in the basket, then when tracking a new one the app placed an order by itself and despite immediately realising it couldn't cancel because restaurant doesn't have phone number and these useless app doesn't have customer service, absolutely furious
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Mario Romano

review: Used this app maybe 5 times total but customer service is terrible and does not compete with other (more localised) delivery apps that I use more often. E.g. a restaurant claimed I had cancelled an order, which did not happen, I calmly explained my situation but despite informing me that this had happened 5 times THAT DAY to others, ubereats claimed they couldn't do anything about it and I would not be receiving a full refund. So money spent for nothing. I will not be using this service again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sister Oglop

review: I love having to give the driver a pin. I've had some really bad experiences with other food delivery apps, especially Door Dash, but not Uber drivers. The restaurant may mess things up but the drivers always get it right. Again...Uber I appreciate the code we give to the driver!
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Mariam Carter

review: Absolutely horrible. Food is priced higher than the restaurants charge. You have to pay more to have your food brought right to you instead of to someone else first. It's constantly cold because of this added 10-20 minute delay. The Fees on top of all this...it's a shell of its former self
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Zack Shaw

review: It's always good, there are a few restaurants that aren't listed that all. I enjoy being able to order my pick up foods through this app instead of looking for the right site online for each restaurant. So far so good, it just becomes a little expensive doing it too often!
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Keyerra Janeau

review: Poor Offshore/After Hours support. I've been using this app on a weekly cadence since covid (sometimes multiple times during the week if I can double stack promos), but this last order was the final straw. I was overcharged by almost $30 and the offshore/after hours support only responded with scripted unhelpful replies. You can tell the level of support changes given depending on when you open a ticket and this last guy, Kajal, was only concerned with ticket touches than helping customers.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Doug Chan

review: They continue to be worth the extra little bit for how well they handle each order. I'm always informed and there's no confusion on arrival times or how to deliver. They have just about covered all the bases as you & yours are hungry. It's time to collaborate with all kinds of opinions tastes and diet restrictions , Uber has one for everyone . As soon as you open it food options and great ideas are yours to share. Great Job Uber Eats. Stay Organized😁👍
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Shelly Dane

review: No respect for customers time. Ordered an Indian delivery. Driver turned up with burgers. After around an hour their customer service accepted they'd made an error but we're understaffed so couldn't collect the right order. They promised to refund the cost of the order. Frustratingly by then it was too late to order something else so went hungry this evening. Also no recognition of the time wasted making the order and then contacting customer service to get it resolved. Plus the cash tip.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Andrew Livingston

review: Love it, but wish they had an option to view a map of nearby resteraunts. Half the time I choose suggested resteraunts I get a pop up saying "you seem far from this location". So that's annoying, but otherwise I love it!
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Courtney Keith

review: Tried ordering food but restaurant cancelled. Tried a different place and they cancelled. Both charges are still pending since they said it can take up to a couple days for it to clear. Now I cant touch that money and cant buy food since i dont have enough now to get something else. Horrible. Customer support doesnt know why it happened and cant guarantee it wont happen again so why bother. Cant use this app.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Hector Ovalle

review: This is a pretty nice app to have, granted twice i've had missing items from orders, but they have been amazing when it comes to that! Got a refund plus some in app money for this happening which is really nice to know if my driver messes up or doesn't give me something i can count on uber to do the right thing
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Sora

review: I had great experiences previously. Today some items were missing from my order. Couldn't reduce my tip, had no help from support. I no longer recommend. They said I need to contest delivery within 15 minutes with a receipt... no receipt is brought with delivery! Money grabbers just like door dash
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Jeremy Hendrickson

review: Super buggy. I've had multiple instances of the food getting delivered to the wrong house or just not appearing at all. And if it does arrive, it's a complete gamble on whether it's gonna be hot and fresh or ice cold. Also, why are people even allowed to ride bikes? You almost guarantee you're gonna get it cold when they're on a bike, and god forbid it's storming while they're bringing it (which has happened to me).
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Ryan Mountain

review: Uber eats used to be the best. Now it's just as bad as all the others. Over priced, bad delivery drivers, and incredibly poor customer service. Recently, I've had damaged food, cold food, missing food; and Uber eats does nothing about it. They only tell you "this order isn't eligible for a refund" no matter the issue. I recently had to dispute a charge because my order was missing items and they refused to refund me for them. Now they're trying to force that money back from me. DON'T DL THIS APP
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Britney Liedtke

review: I wish I did not get the annual plan. The service on door dash is way better. I didn't request a best replacement but it was the default and I got an item entirely different and Uber eats did not care about it and basically said too bad. Terrible. Stick with doordash.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Mylynh Nguyen

review: I've had a consistent uber deliverer for a bit now and he told me that when him and his friend uber together, they'll 'switch' orders or something so he can give me my food it's borderline sweet and annoying - I just want my food, but then he does his best to make conversation with me when I gotta get back to work 💀 I use it almost everyday when I'm at work and most to all drivers have been good with keeping the food the right temperature - when it's cold or the drinks are warm, it sucks
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Destiny Ramirez

review: Easy ordering, easy delivery. This app makes so many things convenient. I appreciate it so much!! I enjoy all things UBER!! There is the occasional less that 100% experience, but the many good ones I've had make up for it.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Cyra DelaRiviere

review: Total terrible. I was charged for an order that never arrived. I contacted the restaurant to see when it was picked up, and they confirmed that no one collected the order. When I tried to contact uber eats, is no support, only a message from the "help" informing me that if they can not deliver, you will be charged. This was my 1st encounter with Uber eats and will be my last. I organised this order on behalf of my husband, who had become ill on a business trip and was unable to drive. Useless
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Holly Fisher

review: This app is only as good as its couriers. I live in a complex with a security boom that requires vehicles entering to have a valid driver's and car license, two things that any law abiding citizen should be able to produce while in their vehicle. At least 40% of the time, I'm forced to drive all the way to the security entrance because the courier doesn't have a licensed vehicle or personal license. Uber fails to vet their drivers and allows their food to be delivered ILLEGALLY. Not good enough.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Ric Shields

review: Uber Eats makes it so very easy to order and add special delivery, and always stands behind credits for misdelivery or missing items or poorly made food. There aren't always ordering options I'd like but that's the fault/responsibility of the Restaurant. Uber fees are reasonable for the convenience, and they offer 'member' options if you prefer BUT they do NOT require or force you to sign up like some other food delivery services!
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Cheryl Morgan

review: Feedback needs to be an option on the app for customers especially for each restaurants. I wanted to post a feedback for the firehouse subs menu requesting more customization options. Their own separate app is more customizable but doesnt offer delivery. I think customer feedback is important.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Stephanie Canady

review: I've been using the service for a couple years now. Last week I experienced an overcharge from Chipotle. I contacted Uber Eats to rectify the manner as requested. 2 days go by, giving me this list of information they need to issue of $4 refund. As most Americans do, this is too much of a hassle to bother to get $4 back. They do this, I feel purposely to not have to issue these small refunds. Thus would go into a surplus account. I've deleted my app.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Danelle Lucado

review: After placing an order it just dissappears. You have no way of tracking it. This caused me to duplicate my order and get charged twice. There is also no way to cancel the duplicated order, either on the app or online. App needs some serious improvements.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Brendt Wooi

review: They do not correct issues or give refunds. They make mistakes and let you pay for it. They are late and serve cold food and still make you pay full price. They have horrible communication and just ignore the chats you send and send the same message whenever you have a problem...."we complement understand however you do not qualify for a refund". We are not valued customers instead we are just order #s. Thus company only cares about money.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: TheMegz296

review: I can't even say I get my order right 80% if the time. I give it a try like every 3 or so months and when I have issues I report them right away. I take the picture, explained what was ordered and what I got instead, and try to figure things out. The customer service is terrible. I point blank asked twice why they won't give a refund and they thanked me for my understanding. I wouldn't have cared if it was just the app credit or something along those lines. But they don't care about quality.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Nakiiya Gore

review: Good app when things go smooth. But terrible for refunds. I paid priority delivery and also the driver 20% and he goes to overs before me. I then cancel and have to pay half for cancelling fee. This is not right. Delete this app as trued to go through the automated system and got nothing.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Chatchai Ivory

review: Update once again order missing items but customer support refuses to respond. If an order is missing items, we should be refunded for missing items. Service is only getting worse. They make it almost impossible to call for support. App blocks you when try to ask for any customer service.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Liquescence

review: I don't understand why the app constantly wants to reload the list of restaurants while you're browsing through them (which resets you back to the top of the list). It's extremely frustrating.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Paul Dunnavant

review: These guys really went downhill quick, the service is constantly delayed, changing drivers , sending someone on a bicycle who is 5 miles away. No drinks with the order, food made completely wrong and they only want to refund you a quarter of it. Their technology all of a sudden magically sucks too. Won't let you review orders, inability to type in text boxes (on multiple phones), won't upload photos they asked for. Idk what happened, deals are good though, if they get the food right
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Brian Smith

review: I order from spots especially on old national that always either fix my orders wrong or forgets a few items.. then I say something to Uber support and they try to flag my account saying i have done it too many times.. well people need to make sure they get people's orders correct or we won't have to contact support so frequently...
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Lashawn Mahomes

review: Horrible birthday experience. Was charged for an order i canceled within seconds of submitting it incorrectly and wasnt told that it failed to cancel through the app, i was only told after i was charged via an email so i ended up ordering twice and paying twice. The first driver canceled and uber had to find another resulting in a 1 hour wait for a starbucks coffee 4 minutes from my residence. It arrived all watered down and gross. Will never use ubereats again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Megan West

review: Their customer service is abysmal, I didn't receive one of my items that I paid £9.99 for and they've refunded £2.99 and are refusing to reply to me. I am asking for a refund of an item I didn't receive, I'm not asking for anything complicated or for compensation, I just don't want to pay for an item I didn't even receive wiyt the rest of the order. All customer service keep saying is 'we have refunded you 2.99, we will no longer review this conversation'.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Shaun McCutcheon-Kay (smk123)

review: Accidentally ordered at the wrong restaurant for a pick up and the customer service I received was awful. I have one major recommendation, be able to change from pick up orders to delivery. The customer service rep I had also was trying to charge me a cancelation fee for my order? WHO would cancel an order just to get charged extra? Rep also wasn't willing to help at all and kept telling me to call the restaurant. I understand it was MY fault but they should have tried to help more.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Aaron Cappello

review: Their driver dropped our food outside our house and none of it could be saved (it was raining and the food got soaked). Uber swiftly canceled our order, which was nice I guess, but we would have preferred to have it remade and redelivered. We went to order it again and now they want a $19.99 delivery fee, when before it was only $2.49. What a low blow attempt to make back their lost money. I went to order it again anyway and now it says the restaurant is too far away. Do better Uber.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Judah Romano

review: So far my experience has been pretty good. The use of a pin on certain places rather than others gets confusing but the ordering system it pretty good. I haven't had anything technical problems so I like the app
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Alex

review: If I could rate 0 stars, I would. Uber eats has gone downhill. Customer service is a joke. If you don't receive part of your order, customer service barely responds, and you absolutely won't get a refund for the missing items. So essentially, Uber eats steals from you, the customer. And the push for uber one really isn't that worth it, the savings really aren't savings. So glad I've canceled my subscription
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Erikka Botos

review: The help system on this app has gotten significantly worse and it's obvious that it favors the system rather than the consumer that has a legitimate claim. I had an issue with my order but was not provided with any recourse for correction whatsoever when previously I would have been. My order did not have all the items I was charged for, but guess what, I was not afforded the opportunity to even produce evidence. Shameful from you Uber. Deactivating my account effective immediately
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Thokozani Mhlongo

review: I got a notification on my phone from uber eats that said get 15$ off your first order. So I figured why not. I made an account picked some food but when I went to checkout, that 15$ off was nowhere to be found. Didn't place the order, will never give them any money or use the app again. I don't appreciate being tricked into downloading your app
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Tardis 412

review: Uber eats is a complete rip-off. My order was an hour late and cold, but they said they can't give me a full refund because the order wasn't 30 minutes late. I order my food at 12:51pm my food didn't get to me until 2:00pm. The order was $30 and they will only give me back $11.25. They won't even give me back the $5 service fee. Don't use uber eats use doordash instead!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sharmaine Holmes (Mink-Mink)

review: Terrible experience. Made a food order from the JACK IN THE BOX WEBSITE, who apparently farmed it out to Uber Eats. While my order shows the correct address, the driver told me that there was a different address, so i didnt get the food. I went to the restaurant to get my food, but they said, "you have to go thru the app". The problem is, because I didn't order thru the app, I ORDERED THRU THE JACK IN THE BOX WEBSITE, there is no record of the order and no number to call.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Stacy K

review: I have used the app for several years, and never had a problem. I never had to complain about an order either. The one time I complained that my order the customer service was extremely rude, and gave me the run around, also refused to give me a refund for a meal I couldn't eat. Not to mention I only asked for a refund for my meal not the whole order ... Extremely disappointed.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ben Adams

review: An order I made sait it would take >1h. I directly wanted to cancel it before those who were supposed to work on my order started to do just that. When I couldn't find the cancel button even after following the instructions on the "HELP" page, I contacted CS who told me to "wait a few mins for them to investigate." They came back saying that someone was already working on my order so I had to pay the cancelation fee to cancel it. Well, ofc they are working on it, u gave them the time to.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ina Victor

review: For the last 2 times I received food, it was missing items cold and messy. I called, and they said I am restricted. Restricted for what? I pay for uber one and I order frequently spending upwards of 40.00. So I am canceling my uber one and erasing the app. The customer service is horrible. I will never promote Uber eats again, I will post it every timeI get a chance. I will also discourage anyone trying to order from Uber.I never received a call from an uber manager like promised. Bye bye bye!!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ciauntii Drummond

review: Expensive app... it's ok, just NEED to be able to change 4 Digit Pin every time someone orders. The last 4 digits of your own phone # isn't secretive. Am i able to change this 4 digit pin? If not, whats the point of it? I CAN EASILY LISTEN TO MY NEIGHBOR SAYING THEIR LAST 4 DIGITS OF THEIR PHONE NUMBER, FIGURE OUT WHAT TIME THEY USUALLY ORDER FOOD, WAIT FOR DELIVERY PERSON DOWNSTAIRS, AND STEAL THEIR FOOD. I have excellent memory, I'm gonna start stealing food. Thanks Uber Eadiots😒
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Joshua Scott (YMiD1UNV)

review: Lost money for an order that took over an hour & food was soggy and gross by the time I received it. There aren't enough uber drivers so the order will take a ridiculous amount of time and will be a waste of money. Would not recommend uber eats. Door dash is definitely the way to go if anything.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Alivia Korona

review: Ordered food from mcdonalds it turned up well over an hour after ordering it, and it was cold. I was told I would get a refund now, and neither ubereats nor mcdonalds want to give me a refund. Apparently, neither of them took the money, and neither of them have the ability to process the refund amazing how they make money if neither party receive the money I'm out of pocket £40 and will never use either company again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: David Wragg

review: First of all they upcharge for everything you buy vs buying in store, second, they base the tip off of the total including the bs uber delivery charge. You can get food delivered in a decent time for paying about 30% more than picking up. Not worth it.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: kevin green

review: Every other order just seems to have something missing or wrong. It is so unreliable, and items get priced so much higher and delivery fees are a lot unless you have Uber One. Just not the most reliable app.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ghost Beatbox

review: Rider refuses to provide the food after getting the pin number and refuses to hand over food before you provide the pin number. Then after getting the pin they enter it on the app and disappear with the food. Uber support service can only 'help' by asking you to rate the driver. No refunds for your loss(money or food). Never recommend this rubbish to anyone. Full blown scam!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Tharushi Ranasinghe

review: $17 including driver tip and I check back seeing it charge me $28. I go to try to contact customer support and there's no option. Screw these guys, I'm canceling my membership and never ordering from them again. If you don't care about your customers enough to allow us to contact you, then I won't be doing business with you. I will never order through Uber Eats nor Door Dash.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Angry Boi

review: Uber helps me make a decision on dinner meals. They have so many choices to choose from. Also, the items are delivered on time and ready to eat. I recommend this company for breakfast, lunch and dinner to anyone looking for an easy eating options.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Minerva Perez

review: Overall good but have had some late deliverys but didn't feel like I was compensated! I tip plus pay the taxes and delivery fee! And don't complain! Eventually want be using to often for the price might as well go get it myself!
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Quitta Bradley

review: Customer service is repeatedly abysmal! Just polite pre type phrases that don't actually address the issue. Drivers wearing deliveroo uniform or not even the person who it says will be delivering. Brought me the wrong order then went and brought my original order back from someone else house, despite it having been opened and tampered with. Constantly cold. Bits of plastic in my food. Under cooked, all different orders. Try to give the benefit of the doubt but consistently bad service.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sophia Kotzamanis

review: They have the best service! We originally had Doordash and our orders kept getting stolen. We weren't getting refunded for them, so we tried Uber Eats and not only were they never stolen so far. If there's any problem, we got refunded for that item immediately, and the customer service and the experience on the app is so much better. 5 out of 5 stars if I could give 10 stars I would.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Ella Cascino

review: Support still totally appalling - (1) near impossible to actually message anyone (2) when you do find the right option they just send a stock reply, often repeatedly, without reading what was written. Possibly the worst customer service I've dealt with!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Alan Robertson

review: Old food and wrong orders- the feedback/help doesn't ever work when trying to upload pictures. The app crashes every time. I end up having to request refunds instead of having the actual issues within the restaurants corrected.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Ashlee Wilson

review: Honestly I'm disappointed I've never had issues before But the last 3 times my order has been taking so long For a small order 50min to an hour. (Pizza pie) the restaurant is 5 min away and if I order a pick up it's 25 min and it's ready I've made a complaint about a delivery person who told me I didn't order food, when I went out to go fetch it and nothing was done about it.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Nicoline Niemand

review: The worst app ever. They stoled $30 from me. After I canceled an order 10 seconds after ordering it. I never ate the food, I never saw the food, the merchants did not have time to make it. And because I canceled they thought it was okay to take my money anyway. The last time I had food missing and they took my money. I am done with this app.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Jackson Jackson

review: Surprisingly bad customer support. My order was wrong, and no credit, refund, or any attempt to resolve the situation was made. At first I received chatbot-style canned responses from a rep (i.e., same exact replies that didn't answer any of my questions), and when a supervisor finally stepped in, she confirmed that they would not be doing anything to make the situation right. Never ran into this issue with similar apps (e.g., DoorDash, GrubHub) or ANY business that messed up an order.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Brian Kim

review: STAY AWAY. They have practially zero customer service when stuff goes wrong leaving you hungry and out of pocket. Awful company (worst I have dealt with). They left my order next to some bricks, took a photo of it for me which was supposed to be some kind of evidence that they attempted my delivery. App is clunky and bad for supposed 'market leaders'. Go elsewhere, trust me!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Josh Veazey

review: I can't trust this system because drivers can cancel your delivery on a whim, I've had it happen and know drivers who've told me they do it. Meaning you can wait 90mins just to have it cancelled. there's no real support just a few limited multiple choice options which are not helpful. You will get a refund but money might be tied up for 3-7 business days. Also when price comparing uber eats is ALWAYS more expensive. Overpriced and i can't trust my food will come so I'm uninstalling.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: James O'Reilly

review: Courier arrived, but for a long time he could not enter the entrance. Then he got up, but brought only 1 part. There were other products there, and he did not bring them. I told him the code to receive the order, because I thought that he would bring me the second heavy part of the order from below, but he just left, and uber does not want to solve this problem. What should I do in this case? Contact the police? I order very often. I always tip couriers. I called him, but he didn't answer
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Daria Gromova

review: Placed an ordee when I BACKED OUT of an order. I saw the order total and went back to make adjustments. When I hit the back button the order was PLACED instead. It completely skipped the tipping page. Never using again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: David Winter

review: I was incorrectly charged THREE times for one order. I reported this to them on the app and have yet to recieve a response. It's been nearly a week now and still nothing. Blatant lack of consideration for their users. Pathetic. Moving over to another delivery app.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Divesh Govender

review: It is a good app with lots of food choices. I prefer it to other apps, although I don't understand the service fees charges they apply on the orders. Uber eat already takes a percentage from the vendors.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Luigi Sabato

review: Less then one star. Every time I order uber eats or postmates, the restraunts never get it right. Always missing food or wrong items, and uber does nothing about it. Don't ask us to rate the order and when we tell you whats wrong they say oh you aren't eligible for a refund. I wasn't asking unless they don't give me something I paid for but when you ask for a rating that's what I give you. Your customer service is terrible. I give you proof each time they mess up. they continue to let it happen.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Crystal Humphreys

review: You have to jump through some hoops sometimes with customer service but they are generally pretty good when something goes wrong. There is an upcharge per item compared to restaurant price, but its honestly not terrible and without it they couldnt turn a profit, which means no company; so if you want food delivered; its worth it.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Ghashbrug

review: Steer clear people. Terrible customer service. I had 1 complete meal missing, the other meal had half the chips missing from the box, was stone cold and inedible. Would only refund for the missing meal, as it didn't seem to matter the other meal was cold, half a box of chips and went into the bin, IT WAS DELIVERED SO WHAT MORE DID I WANT? A poxy hot meal for 2, not 1 stone cold meal that couldn't be reheated. So I paid £14.13 for a bottle of coke and a bottle of water. Disgusting!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: K G

review: Updated!!! BEWARE, DO NOT USE UBER EATD I ordered multiple times a week until today. Twice this week I received an incorrect order. After being told the first did not qualify for a refund I shrugged it off, but the second time I was missing half of a $100 order. I was again denied. A quick google search will show this is a new refund policy/process. They are enabling restaurants to get paid for full orders but fulfill half. Going back to Doordash and Skip, too bad, I used to love Uber Eats.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Taylor

review: Fee on top of fees, and heaven help you if anything goes wrong because the only help you will get is automated emails saying "sorry to hear you had trouble, leave a restaurant review". Bad for customers, bad for drivers, bad for restaurants, just all round bad. 6/10/2023 edit: service has gotten even worse. Now the likelihood of even receiving your order is slim. I was used to wrong orders, but that was still better than MIA orders.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Krus Turner

review: I give 5 star because my experience with uberEats have been lovely the drivers have been on time & food is hot that's my favorite part the only thing I don't like is on app prices for food from some restaurants are high but in the same restaurant going there is cheap so I think your paying more on app but that's ok for me sometimes cause I'm lazy some days to go in order.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Debaraca Phillips

review: Customer service is a joke. They did not help at all when I even asked about connection with the driver when I attempted to connect through 7 times. They will just say they can not help, but will do better in the future to help. I hope the driver enjoyed the food they kept and did not deliver to me. I would not waste my time with this app whatsoever. Biggest joke.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Brit Harpool

review: I used this app for years and spent crazy amounts of money on it. THEN my past three orders have been totally wrong and they did NOTHING to fix it. No refunds, awful wait times for customer support. Will be ditching them for Caviar, which is slightly more expensive but willing to admit when they've made a mistake. Bye bye Uber Eats, and food riddance!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Connor Toth

review: The choice of food is great. And you can order, snacks, groceries, and even alcohol. BUT, the unreliability if delivery drivers lost the fifth star. But, it's still good enough that I keep using it.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Simon Angel

review: I'm so happy with uber eats I dropped everyone else but I wish there are more promotions. So it's been few years since this review but I don't feel that way about uber eats anymore what happened to the permotions anymore I used to order 3 to 4x a week now it seems they want only convenient store business all their promotions are for that I guess everything has on ending.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: S Tesfazghi

review: App is well designed for finding restaurants, but the support is the worst of any service I've dealt with. Uber makes receiving money you're owed for their mistakes extremely difficult. Be very wary using ubereats, they will try to screw you whenever they can
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Andrew JFIvory

review: I tried to use this app for groceries, but time and time again I get the wrong items delivered. Uber has stopped helping me on these issues and I'm left paying for food I'm going to throw away. Use instacart or something else if you want to get groceries delivered.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Parker Johnson

review: The extra fees they add the the food are ridiculous. The promos are nice but they don't make up for how much extra they add to each item. Fees for things that are free. Lack of customizable options. Uber is not what it used to be.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Alicia Angel

review: Worst customer service ever, send loads of printing offers but will not reply to any contact??? Was charged for the order and the order did not show up into the my orders screen, tried calling multiple numbers which had zero help. In app agent contact sucks so bad, two email addresses which are not monitored?? I have been charged and no way of disputing this
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Royston Bhaskaran

review: They don't care about your time as the statement says whenever your order is late. For starters they always overload the friggin deliverymen with 2 or 3 deliveries, you can always expect it to be at least half an hour late. Made us lose time that would have been for lunch And at times when the restaurant makes a mistake with an order, big names like KFC, they just refund a small amount that doesn't sum up the actual item price
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Oliver Pabloff

review: It's a great app that works perfectly fine, with good choices to pick and eat. Would give it a 5 star if there was time to time more discount on more selected restaurants than repeating one's.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Henry Hernandez

review: At first this app was ok no brilliant just ok. The real let down is help. You cannot get any real help or support. If you have paid any money out good luck in getting it back in a timely fashion. The other real let down is getting an order to display as accepted or rejected. This app needs something that states order accepted or something that tells them that the order has been rejected.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Anon Mouse

review: Could be cheaper even with uber one its still pricey, if you cancel and order and expect a refund its not only not guaranteed but if you do get a refund it will take around a week or more
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Mr._female

review: I had a pretty messed up order and the driver was not communicative even though I texted multiple times. I took pictures of the order and receipt for Uber support for my $30 purchase (in which only got 2 out of 6 items from the order) and the gave me $1 refund and $5 Uber cash. They have no actual people to talk to and now that I'm trying use the Uber cash, they are only giving me $3. This app kinda sucks.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Dallas Humphreys

review: Absolutely rogues!! No help with changing delivery address within the first 5 mins. Charged £32.68 to cancel within 5mins of ordering!! Response a day later saying refund not applicable,Uber eats has no interest in providing help or support. Never again!! Orders and payments will go through ok, but God forbid you make an error and need help, total dead on the app. Zero stars really.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Alexandra Akah

review: Ordered food for delivery. The delivery person didn't knock or ring bell. Much later a neighbor rang bell and showed me the food bag left outside. The food was cold. Very unprofessional service!!!! And unacceptable!! He should have knocked, rang bell, phoned, msged....to ensure customer receives the food. Didn't expect this. Since I wrote this service's much better but the app isn't 100% often in middle of browsing takes u to home pg which puts u off even after reinstalling it still does that
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: N P

review: Quiet often when there is an issue with the food, the app doesn't work when needing to upload the photo to prove issue with order. There is no other way to connect for help and refunds. I have lost many refunds by extremely substandard unedible food as the app won't respond.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Kirsten G

review: Not many issues with the app, drivers fins you easily. Restaurant issues are difficult to deal with but the resturants all seem to be decent, 2 issues in about 6 months with resturants, none with the app itself.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Crystal G

review: customer service is sub-par at best, everything has an excuse behind it. when I'm marketed additional promotional offers to retain my business, nothing is applicable upon checkout, and I'm blamed for a breach of contract. when I'm not even signed up for a service. sounds like this will end up in court again. thanks über
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: charles franchini

review: The experience is awesome the ordering process is quite simple there are many selection to choose from however I will still give it five stars even though the delivery fee is sometimes a little higher than I would like but when you're sitting in the middle of nowhere it's great to be able to get food delivered
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: joseph horrell

review: Coming up to 24 hours without a response via the help chat option. I requested a refund as there was bad food quality issues, I had a copy and paste template back stating they would not issue a refund. I asked them why, now they will not get back to me. The conversation is still open and coming up to 24 hours without a response following my few attempts to reach out to resolve the issue. This is disgusting and I will not be using Uber eats again. I will keep reaching out till I get a response.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Chels'

review: Not worth the hassle most of the time. You get local food colder and more expensive than if you ordered from them directly. Rarely worth the extra cash. If you're vegetarian you'll get the delivered a meal with meat about 2/5 times and customer service will try to make you think it's your fault.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Liam Galbraith

review: Horrific experience with Uber Eats. Driver took a 40 minute detour resulting in a freezing cold and inedible meal (ended up having to order from somewhere else via Deliveroo). Despite multiple, frustrating attempts to actually have a conversation with someone from the support team to receive adequate compensation, I have been left significantly out of pocket and extremely disappointed with the service. I will not be using Uber Eats again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Ben Gordon

review: I've almost always had a positive experience with Uber Eats, and the few times my order was either late or incorrect customer service has always given me credit back as an apology. It's a good app for ordering food, although things tend to add up a bit on the pricier side if you don't have Uber One, although just using the service twice generally pays for the subscription cost so if you use the app at least four times a month you get your money's worth.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Mike Chamberlain

review: Drivers don't read directions properly, can drop your food off at the wrong place, as long as they take a picture of a door with the same number, the delivery is confirmed an no refunds will be given even if you never got your order. You are expected to find the door in the confirmation picture as if in some sort of easter hunt for your food. Even providing proof that the door in the picture is not yours is considered a valid reason to be given any kind of credit. I just lost $75, thanks Uber.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sergio Mora

review: Real frustrating. Spent way too much on here and the dogs just charged my for Uber Credit which was given as a refund for an out-of-stock item on a previous order. I used the 5 dollar credit on a separate order the next day, and 4 days later they have charged me for it, effectively stealing $10. Boycott the dogs and use any other service or your own feet. Ffs, criminal behaviour and so little recourse. I have had to renstall the app just to query the theft from me days after using their service.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Paul Johnson

review: Very negative experience. The service charge does not show up in the calculations until you pay. I've also included a tip, a percentage of the total, which was higher than I expected. Overall, a misleading payment system. I won't use it again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Eva Russo

review: I hate this company. Their policies work against consumers, and customer service is extremely unsatisfactory. It took me over two hours to receive a refund for food that was never delivered to my home. The deliverer dropped my order off at an address that wasn't mine, yet I had a difficult time getting my money back. They did not offer any credits for the time spent conversing with incompetent representatives. This one star rating with persistent until someone from Uber Eats reaches out to me.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Meka K. The Designer 2021

review: I understand letting drivers make more money by picking up multiple orders. But, it's incredibly infuriating that every food order is cold by the time you get it cause the driver spends an additional 30+minutes dropping off another order first. Even once and awhile would be understandable, not 4 orders in a row.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Danny J

review: Though it does what you expect it to, sometimes on my first open of the app I'll make some sort of navigation and the app will self-restart and it's THEE most frustrating thing. It occurs more than daily, I'd say on every session.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Cristian Hernandez

review: Can be very useful!. Most of the time very pleased. So great when I don't have to go out. But on few occasions the driver had other deliveries on the way and food was cold. Few other times like pizza was set sideways and everything slid to one side. But most of the time things are good.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Martin Shumate

review: Horrible ! I drive for Uber eats! Honestly they are so horrible at refunding you what you are worth. They don't communicate well what so ever when trying to explain an issue. I have been doing multiple orders since Friday and they have screwed up and canceled my orders at least half a dozen times. I waited 45 mins for an order and all they would refund was a 5$ that's it. Then cancled my order with out my permission. Then today cancled 2 more of my orders and yet have I gotten an explanation.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Sara Farabee

review: I normally don't have an issue with ordering food with Uber but lately if I make a food order that's worth £50 or more I either don't receive it at all or I'm missing pretty much all of the order like today I received the cheap items of some sausage rolls a pastie and a veggie slice but I missed out two lots of meal deals for two a box of four doughnuts and a cookie bomb so I lost out on food to eat before bed and down £35.50 out of my £52 order it's ridiculous and I've still not heard from them
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Zoe Stacey

review: My order was delayed (whatever fine) but i was going to cancel and they offer $2.15 in credits if i kept it. So i did but then it took another hour and so i requested a different driver and it got there in 10 minutes great right, but then my order was wrong and now i cant get money back because i accepted the credits for it being delayed 2 hours, but now i have the wrong food and im out more money for food i didnt even order and cant get anything back for a seprate issue.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Bailey Rey

review: This app is a scam. I had over 50 on my uber cash, when I went to use it it kept saying there was an error to contact help, when I did it took 24 hrs to be able to usemy uber cash again, once I used it my order was canceled and I was never refunded the money. I still had over 25 on my account and it will not let me use any money on my uber cash now again after they sp call fixed the problem. It's been 3 days and they say ther aren't able to lift the restrictions on my uber cash. 0 stars from me
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Jazlyn Hall

review: SCAM! DON'T DOWNLOAD YOU WILL NEVER RECEIVE YOUR FOOD! They take your order and when it is time for delivery they cancel the order mentioning that the driver cancelled due to 'technical issues'. Not the first time it's happened. No compansation, no empathy and no care for regular users. I waited for 1 hour for my order and they didn't care to even offer me other options or anything. Pathetic.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Carvin Contractor

review: They stole my order and refused to refund my money. I ordered food for myself and colleagues. The driver fetched the order from chicken licken and stole my order. The app wrongfully reported it was delivered with pin entered. It was a night mare to report the crime on the app, kept making me go in a loop. And even after they learnt that my order was stolen they didn't want to refund me. Several of my colleagues reported having had similar incidents. Do not use this app!!!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Yoyo LTLY

review: Uber is to expensive in my area. The restaurants charge 20ish % extra per item. For example, it's only 15$ for butter chicken at my favorite restaurant in store. On uber its 18.99. Then there's a 15% in fees from Uber. Then, of course, tipping the driver (not tipping is a d-move) 15-20%. So, my 15$ order quickly becomes 25$. Normally, I get a few meals (40-70$), like most families. It endes up being 100-140$ everything, I need to use Uber. That's insane. 30-40% extra every time.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: Veronica Darlings

review: The app is pretty good. I just wish you would bring back predictive text in the chat. Typing messages to drivers takes so long when you have to type every character.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
name: Patricia

review: In the UK we don't have a door dash, so Uber is my go-to option! Although we have deliveroo and Just Eat. Uber has it all. Once I ordered random food at 3Am and it was delicious! When my daughter went to hospital she didn't like the food options there so we Ubered breakfast for her. They missed an item and sent us an apology card with a freebie!! They're always on time and will always refund you if needed. They even let you pay later when you have the money! They're fast and efficient. 10/10
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Suraya Khan

review: Terrible app. Never will I ever use a single uber app in my life, I ordered something worth 40 bucks and canceled it right away then it proceeded to not give me my money back even though the order wasn't even sent to the pizzeria yet. Also, their coupons/discounts are FALSE, they told me I'd save 60% off an order ($20) and then proceeded to tell me the offer was deemed invalid. Please don't ever touch this scam money hungry company again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Eric Coronel

review: Don't buy groceries from uber eats, they will charge once and put a hold on the same amount for the exact same amount, and they said it'll take 5 business days to come back to my account. It's been now almost 10 days, and customer service keeps brushing me off. I just want my money so I can delete the app. Terrible!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Wahab Alharbi

review: I've been using UberEATS from quite a while now and I never really had any issues with it. I switched to Uber due to my bad experiences with DoorDash. Since then I've been using it since. I also decided to subscribe to UberOne, it saves me money and I appreciate it greatly. And my food usually comes nice and safely. There's nothing negative I have to say. I hope the best for this app.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

review: Amazing app. Little too expensive, but a lifesaver if you can't go out or simply don't wanna move from where you are. Good variety of food, even Puerto Rico, very efficient and 0 problems so far... Good download!!!!

review: Uber Eats is a game-changer! The app's ease of use, diverse restaurant options, and real-time tracking make ordering a joy. Timely, professional delivery ensures fresh, delicious meals. My top choice for convenient, high-quality food delivery.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

review: App does not seem to function well nowadays. When I click on an item, it's just blank. Cannot see any details. Had to uninstall as it became annoying. Ordered through doordash instead.

review: The app doesn't offer you all the same options as if your siting in the establishment. It's get the job done. They already charge you a fee for the delivery which is nice. Due to some not being able to tip much.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Key

review: Every time I have a issue it's never resolved I used this app for many years over the years its got worse and worse. Even down to your orders not being fulfilled. And I'm being told I'm not getting a refund. Now let me ask you one quick question if you eat in a restaurant and you order a welldone burger, and it comes rare! I mean bloody rare. They will automatically change it or refund you. Well this app will just ignore you or say thanks for letting us know. That's it. Deliveroo is 100% better!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Uber Eats is a game-changer for food delivery. The app's user-friendly interface makes ordering a breeze, and the vast selection of restaurants is impressive. The real-time tracking feature ensures you know exactly when your meal will arrive. Plus, their frequent discounts and promotions make it even more enticing. Highly recommend!
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

review: Too many let downs at this point. The support does the best they can to help customers but uber itself is always awful and they do not care about their customers. We ordered from McDonald's. Simple 1 Sundae and 1 Thick shake. The driver gets there and he is told their machines are broken (surprise surprise) and I have to cancel the order. Uber then charged me a $13.50 cancellation fee. How is it fair that you had these items as available, we get told we have to cancel, and then we get charged ?
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: This service was good and then I had an issue with a delivery. Not only did I not receive my order but there is no customer service. I waited over 2 hours before I cancelled and then had to get my own order. When I arrived there was two orders for me there. I will not ever use this service again. Your not the only one's to deliver food. Step your customer service up asap.

review: Terrible, incompetent, useless delivery service. They've given my food to homeless people, stolen my orders, taken an hour and a half because they were delivering on foot, ect. Tonight I had 2 orders in a row not show up and I ended up having to get food on my own at midnight after waiting 3 hours for ubereats. Then I had to message support to get a refund, then message them again to get a refund for my tip. Waste of time, totally useless, incompetent, and overpriced.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Don't waste your time and money! My order has never been right or on time! There's no number to call and only automated responses! So you end up paying ALL that money for an incorrect order that you're never reimbursed for! Regular Uber is expensive but decent! Uber eats is expensive an horrible!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Wonderful App only with a slight UX issue I hope the developers read this message. When a restaurant offers a 1+1 deal over any product item, their restaurant name would stay forever as a restaurant offering a deal. Because of that, there is a huge traffic of restaurants with deals over a piece of bread that occupy the space and block the visibility over other restaurants with actual daily deals. I suggest to put a shorter and unrepeatable time limit over these deals. Thanks

review: Horrible past experience. The driver forgot items and uber eats refused to refund me. I have the receipt with proves the items are missing. I don't ask for refunds often and I'm even an uber one member . Try elsewhere don't let these pirates take your money on some one else's mistake! On top of that they statt taking tips with out consent. I tip cash and even though I put 0 it still take money form me to tip. Robbery!!!

review: Provides little to no customer support when delays occur. You simply have to wait and see if someone will pick up your order or if it'll get refunded. review: Sometimes the food may be deliver not much satisfactory but they resolve the issue if we raise a complaint and I like a key feature like if the payment didn't go through they just provide the payment cost and we can pay it later. Even though this feature is unheard but it saves us from time to time and I loved using this app
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

review: Easy to use and great layout. Easy to find whatever you're looking for. Never any functionality issues. Uber Eats has been killing it lately with all the incredible promos and deals, too! A+++

review: Unless you can afford to tip, don't bother. Uber doesn't pay its drivers good enough and they allow drivers to see the tip before accepting orders... So basically you'll end up paying for cold food cause drivers keep not taking the order or dropping it... Uber will refund any mistakes or cold food the first couple of times but after that they'll say your order doesn't qualify for a refund.... Huh? So if the restaurant messed up or the food is stale thx to drivers then you're $hit out of luck..

Drivers should go back to fix the order, I shouldn't have to accept bad service and pay for it. Don't offer coffees on your app if the drivers can't deliver it without spilling.

review: Great deals all the time keep me coming back for all the different food options. And of course my Costco delivery is always on point. It's also very nice to give extra tip for the hard work of the drivers. I know how hard and stressful this job can be just doing it a very short time. Thank you!

review: Reported two drivers that beyond didn't match profile picture, each said of that is my spouse. So I asked if they were in the car, and both said no! Since those reports, I can not rate any driver, and Uber Eats support only tells me that it is an IT issue!!!! So I order random stuff from liquor, to groceries, to restaurant food, and still can not rate delivery people; uet Uber Eats still says it is an IT issue, and my account has not been blocked feom rating/reporting drivers!!

review: Be careful if you are ordering food thru this app constantly. If food is incomplete several times, eventually, Uber will not reimburse you. It will not matter if you can provide the proof. I refuse to pay for items damaged, incomplete or in bad conditions. They invited me to rate the restaurant....well no the app is responsible for their vendor's quality, so here's your effing review.

The driver does not answer calls and the app says he is busy with other deliveries so I don't even know how far away he is. Uber Eats is not worth it anymore, especially with such inflated food prices.

review: Now I remember why I stopped using this site; my instructions were to leave the food with the receptionist at the front desk, but they left the food in front of the outside door where anyone coming into the building could pick it up. Door Dash follows instructions and leaves the food with the receptionist, who then notifies me my food has arrived.

review: Overall experience is dope, except when they make some offer and do not provide enough couriers even in big cities, and you just gotta look at the food you'd like to eat on the screen. Not worth the nerves, I'd expect reliability from food delivery, and they lack exactly that.

review: It's okay. Great for a quick delivery, however some functions of the app don't work (such as unsubscribing from the automatic renewal), so be prepared to call their customer support in order to do some actions.

review: The app itself works fairly well, but the service has drastically gotten worse. We have had more orders canceled or never show up than completed orders lately. Uber Eats used to provide customer service and compensate customers when they made a mistake. Now they simply offer an apology and do the same thing to you the following night. Unfortunately, we will no longer be using Uber Eats. We can understand and accept that mistakes happen, but cannot deal with poor or rude customer service.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Can't get a human order is two hours late and driver just messaged me saying it was cancelled. I have a new driver and another hour wait, but they won't let me cancel without charging me. Avoid

review: Months of paying for Uber One & still unable to order groceries, no response from Uber. No surprise. Have to deal with them for a business account too...same lack of support. After days of trying to get help, we finally got 1 email that was completely unhelpful. Customers & biz owners, pls regularly log in to check everything is ok

Poor marketing decision, company is going to have more problems and customer complaints. Will revise review if they change this.

review: I made and order Two days ago i ordered a family bundle received only a part of the order i contacted help from uber was responded to 2days late and because of that was told they couldn't help me with the issue I've had this app for years I don't feel appreciated as a customer and about to start using another app will dispute the transaction this isn't cool uber how u losing a customer for a mistake from the restaurant and uber lost out in nearly 50 dollars and didn't receive what I paid for....

Don't get this app, don't use this service, they won't help you.

I have now received my order 2 hours after placing it and after ordering from somewhere else so I could eat something tonight. Help support was useless and I'm very upset with how this was dealt with.

The whole reason they are having to refund is because they are messing up the orders but they bully and penalize customers

Uber is know to underpay it's workers. Everybody'd like to see it change, but this is out of order and just pure greed. I know it's a recession but this has been gooing on for a while. Another costumer lost

I deleted my account and I'm just sticking with DoorDash going forward. UberEats are just a bunch of crooks l, so don't bother doing business with UberEats
