stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Douglas Lee

review: This app is honestly getting a joke. Waiting am hour for a delivery for the driver to go to some random house then cancel my order... if I could give this app a zero star I would. Support is useless, just give automated responses and are now choosing to just not help. Ordered food, arrived and they didn't follow any of my special instructions. Couldn't eat any of it. £30 wasted and Ubereats did nothing about it. Blamed it on the merchants. Don't know how that helps me. Never ever order from here
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: connor etchells

review: Tell me I owe money I have already paid again you seem to not know i have bank transaction's to show i have paid for my trips! then after repeated attempts to order $45 worth of food it keeps telling me there are not enough funds when I have $1300 in that account. All good I ordered directly from the business. Sort yourself out Uber. I'll also I'll be following up on the double and triple charges.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Matt Houston

review: Since the update, there is a blank screen when you choose an item. I've tried multiple restaurants, updating the app, then uninstalling and reinstalling. Nothing helped.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: ADiscoInfernal

review: Terrible app. I tried ordering food off of uber eats, and they delivered it to a completely random location. Yes, I did get a refund, but the inconvenience of having to go through this was unnecessary.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: John Fraser

review: Easy to use. Simple and easy to use. Maybe too easy as when you can't be bothered you get lazy and just order your bits and bobs from the local shop 😉 bit all in all I love it. I also love the priority option if you're wanting yours first.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: L Montgomery

review: Worst customer service If you have a problem with your order don't bother trying to contact customer support because it will just keep forcing u to talk to a bot or if you do get a person they will be unhelpful, 100% of the time even with basic questions on how to use the app 100% don't recommend
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: David Almaraz-Estrada

review: Fairly reliable, biggest issue is quality checks by the drivers so drinks or portions of meals are almost always missing. Still not NEARLY as many issues as I get from competing apps tho, so over all a positive experience
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: TheBenttwigChild

review: Absolutely the worst customer service EVER!!! The app always messes up and they just tell you they can't help and close your chat!!! I wish the restaurant I use Uber for was on a different delivery app. I WOULD NEVER USE THIS APP IF IT WAS!!!!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: The GOAT

review: Wow, I have used this app for so many years now. Post covid, I made 4 work trips to Adelaide Australia 2016 - 2019 each trip about 3 months. This was my go to app for all my meals. Restaurants choices were great and I had copy of all my food receipts . . . I ordered so much from this one restaurant in Australia, that that sent me $100 gift card!!... Check my order history, you should be able to verify all this . . .
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Patrick F. Doyle

review: Pretty good food and delivery. Can get any take out I want without leaving my bed and comfy blankets but then have Chipotle show up at my front door. I love it. However they do mess up sometimes and dont deliver all your food you ordered and some places dont give u all the options I know are available in person. Overall though decent beside 2x they delivered my food to my neighbor's place. But they immediately refunded me and gave me $20 in uber cash and free uber one for 3 months. 4/5.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Matthew Williams-Prosser

review: Please save yourself the headache and don't use this app. If a restaurant or store/driver, forgets an item or gets the wrong item, they won't refund you, even though it's not your fault. They have the worst customer service I've ever dealt with. They use automatic responses instead of actually human responses and will end the chat on you when you speak up about how you feel. If I could give - ⭐ I would. I would rather go hungry than order from this app
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Nicole

review: This is, without a doubt, the worst customer support I've ever dealt with! My promo code did not apply when I ordered breakfast this morning. I've reported it. I was told that I don't qualify for a refund. I did not ask for a refund. I wanted the promo applied asit should have been at checkout. It is now 12:00am 10/21/23. I've been dealing with this issue all day. Still no resolution. I wouldn't have ordered if it were not for the promo. Will add update if possible.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Stephanie L Bower-Stacy

review: I've never had a negative experience with Uber Eats (unlike a couple other major food delivery services 😒). Not only that, but UE has literally saved me from going hungry for a week; when I had no money and still a week away from my paycheck, I was able to still order a week's groceries — on them. Of course I paid them back when I got my pay, but that's no different than if a friend floated me £20. I'm not planning to stop using Uber Eats for food delivery anytime soon.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Kyl Opm

review: Charges you a fee for a order cancelled because the restaurant had no food left, and didn't call UberEATS or the driver to let them know that. So you get charged the fee for the restaurant preparing a order somehow with absolutely no food available and them not telling the driver that they had no food available and not to come. Which when you look at UberEATS policy it is absolutely the restaurants responsibility to contact them in that case.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Teresa D Jones

review: New bug after update. Crashes the app as soon as you open. I get a message saying you'll have to wait for developer to provide a fix. Uninstalled and reinstalled, restarted phone. Cleared cache. No luck.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Abhi

review: Easy to use, reliable, I love the reward deals you get after a purchase, Uber One is only worth it if you use app at least 3 to 4 times a week which I don't so I haven't subscribed to it in a couple of months.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Jay Teemona

review: The app itself is fine, its user friendly and what not. But the conditions make no sense. Drivers will not pick up the whole order or pay any attention and then deliver half an order and UberEats refuses to refund it. They tried to make me send a picture of what i got which i sent and also the receipt which I didn't get from the driver whatsoever and do nothing. Basically the restaurant stole my money and the driver delivered nothing. It's not my fault restaurants send incomplete orders.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Zoe Cuevas

review: there have been a few times where items have been missing from my orders. The most recent one is that I'm missing like $70 worth
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Josh

review: The Uber Eats app will plague you with popup notifications offering free memberships, promotions and discounts but then refuses to honor and changes the price back to full on final invoice. SCREENSHOT EVERYTHING, CHECK YOUR INVOICES. You're probably being scammed. Customer support will hang up on you or promise to follow up but then ghost you. Uber offered me a free membership but still charges as if I didn't have it. This bait and switch marketing is probably illegal
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Good User interface and updated restaurant in the city and quick delivery! I has one issue where I couldn't change my name on address, I have to add it to the notes everytime.
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
name: Rahul Srinivas

review: I just had the worst experience ever. My food was picked up by someone else. My delivery driver had to pretend he completed the order. Then the app would refuse to do anything to help since the order was marked as completed
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Karl Shen

review: 2023/08/16 To date we have spent R12 384 for this year alone using the app, overall service is great, but the past couple of months, our oders are delayed everytime, even when we pay for the priority delivery, this is really dissappointing, I am considering to use Mr D exclusively, as they don't seem to have such extended delays. The excuse of the restaurant not receiving Uber's online orders is a fixable error. Please fix it, or loose us.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Mitzi Seyfferdt

review: If I cancel an order there's a chance that I will still have to pay or have to pay a portion of my order for wasting my the driver's time. But like tonight if someone delivers my food in the wrong house. I can't even talk to my delivery man or an Uber representative but an AI. Just like if my food were still under cook or frozen I will just get a reimbursement for the purchase or dish. How about my time and inconvenient.
stars: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
name: LA Vitan

review: When you feeling lazy it's a good thing to order and get it delivered. What I don't like is when I have a promotion that says $8 off of $30. I would get items to add up to $30 but with tax it's still more money. So it's like I'm not getting a discount
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

review: The last several deliveries have been disastrous. It is impossible to contact anyone through the app. I've paid through the nose in service fees when only 1 item out of 5 or 6 is actually delivered! No comeback, to feasible complaint procedure. My business will going elsewhere!
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: Stephanie Sealy

review: This company twice has ran an add for a restaurant that doesn't support their company. You will never know until they send you a message that your order has been cancelled after you set there and wait for your order to arrive. I still may not have known until I called the restaurant that I placed the order at and that's how I found out what really has happened. Because of this I will not use their service again.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
name: James Farris

review: I came from a town of only 400 people, very little choices for food. Moved from that tiny speck on the map to Las Vegas to move in with my fiancé. She introduced me to Uber Eats, I love it! I've tried so many different types of food. So this isn't some post whining about not getting a certain % off of stuff, I'm just a lover of food. Thanks to Uber Eats, now I have so many different choices.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Curtis Terrill

review: What is with the recent cash grab with multiple stops in opposite directions on bicycle deliveries..? I had pre ordered so the food still reached a couple of mins before the cutoff time and the agent kept harping on that, completely ignoring that everything was lukewarm when it reached me. The delivery person was out for at least 45 mins with my food in this cold Rochester weather and probably didn't even bother insulating it or separating the hot and cold items.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Driver picks up and delivers multiple stops before getting to you. Consistently get cold and soggy food that is always late. Much less frustrating to just get the food myself.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Uber takes 0 responsibility for the delivery times being adhered to. Now you have to pay more money to have any chance of getting your food on time. Very disappointed in this international organization.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Frankly lots of people complaining below are the problem in Canada, they want everything free or cheap and if not they get mad. I appreciate Uber Eats convenience and how it has helped me explore restaurants and dark kitchens from the comfort of my house. The platform runs nice and their conflict resolution system works 9/10 times. 5 stars in a world that forgets this amount of convenience was impossible a decade ago.

review: Absolutely terrible app. Food consistently arrives cold and no refund will be issued. Uber makes it very difficult to delete your account. Overall uber is a poorly managed app that will never look out for its customers. Stay away.

The problem was escalated to a different department that was supposed to email me. I never received an email. I just want to use the money that I allocated to Uber for lunches.

It happened before that i ordered food for my nephew and 2 hours went past, he had to endure 2 hours of hunger and crying because of your incompetent staff that wastes time. It's really ridiculous how often this happens and i will stop ordering if this continues. Jesus

review: Had a very bad experience, I just made an order on the 31st of August nd there was no activity on the app about the order nd when I searched for past orders, it came that there are no details since I was not charged for it, which was a big lie as when I went through my bank account now I saw tat I was charged for tat order. When I contacted customer service they said since 48 hours have passed that cannot refund my order, it was around 37 dollars, it is not justice wat they did to me
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Poor customer service. It used to be good but service has gone downhill. They don't offer refunds for valid reasons anymore. This is a sign of a shady business. Seems like they hired Indian customer service agents and they don't understand what you tell them, they just respond like an AI.

review: Not worth using, or being a paid member. Was delivered wrong order, sent report via Uber app with a photo of the wrong order and waited but heard NOTHING back. Do not recommend, Just Eat is way better.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Both orders took over an hour and half to arrive. Both times the rider arrived at the store, rode 2 miles away (without my food), then turned around and went back to the store, when they arrived back they were replaced by another rider who then delivered my food, cold. Was told by Uber the best they could do was give me £5 towards my next order (which I don't want). Use another app if you are hungry.
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: I have been using this app now for around 10 month's but not anymore, I only used it for takeaway delivery. 9/10 the delivery is late the food is cold & all Uber do is refund the delivery charges every now & then? McDonald's for example I have to air fry the chips & heat the burgers in the microwave, what's the point anymore I give up... No replies from Uber customer service probably because I have complained twice now they don't bother... Am done!

review: I Currently cant order anything, when choosing an item, the menu that pops up that usually has options like on its own or in meal etc or choosing the salad is completely blank only the back arrow and add to basket buttons exist, pressing add doesnt work as I cant choose any options

review: If you look up the restaurant menu you will see Uber marks up individual items sometimes TWICE the price. This company is a total scam. If you just order from the restaurant, it is always far cheaper than going with Uber. This app should be illegal.

review: I wish notes to restaurants were allowed. 90% I want no ice, but there isn't an option. And no choice to be able make alterations or notes since I am also always missing something from Taco Bell. I don't get reimbursed for missing items
stars: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

review: Customer support is trash when they are put on the spot, and their system can't keep track of how it bribes you. Nothing like going to cancel Uber's version of a premium subscription, and getting offered 90% off to keep it. Then the payment comes out and look at that, I JUST PAID FULL PRICE ANYWAYS. Instead of recognizing their system screwed me over, they try to tell me "everything's in order". Like hell it is. And cows fly and give birth to llamas. To say Im appalled is an understatement
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: My deliveries have been extremely late (>1 hour) or not delivered at all despite being "priority order", having an uber pass and spending exorbitant service fees. The customer support is also bad - while swift they will just post generic copy/paste "sorry" answers while not addressing the issue, cutting you off abruptly and discontinuing conversation. Shouldn't be surprised - they treat drivers and restaurants badly too. suggested I rate them low rather than Uber Eats! Staff don't speak English
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: Aboslutey trash app and trash company. Run far away. Uber flagged my 8+ year old account for something they can't explain and refuse to speak to me... I am concerened my account was hacked and they still wont help. Miserable excuse for a service. When the going gets tough, Uber gets going away
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: The service in a major city is terrible, drivers say they will collect the order then change their minds 20 minutes later. Your order gets bounced round loads more drivers before someone picks it up and when the food eventually arrives it's cold. Sick of paying over the odds for cold food when it's no fault of the restaurant. Avoid
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: It serves its purpose. I'm giving it 5 stars to recognize the app developers, and I am thankful to have options being handicapped, but I must say that ridiculous service fees that make the platform itself run with all of the revenue the corporation already makes are also harmful to those of us are handicapped. Also, pay your driver's more at the base level. Stop being stingy.
stars: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
name: Jimmy Erdely

review: Why is there no option for "other" when explaining a complaint about your delivery? Several times now I have had food orders ruined (particularly drink orders) because the driver put the items directly in front of my screen door. But there's no way for me to actually explain that this was the issue without having to call the driver. I'm a single woman who often is home alone, I am not going to call and complain to a strange delivery guy who now knows where I live.
stars: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

review: Upsetting. because I ordered 1 thing, but all of a sudden, it ended up picking all the orders into my cart. I tried getting a refund, but it turns out they wouldn't let me. I'm honestly upset and they better do something!

review: Just a joke of a delivery app. They send you promos that you can't use and the Uber one service is a scam. stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

Sure you are sorry about it!there's literally no way to talk to someone about it
stars: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

review: This is just a scam. Whenever you order the tip is based off of the "estimated amount" which is inflated on purpose. Uber then offer the delivery to their dasher at the minimum amount+inflated tip. If their drivers don't take it, it hurts the driver rating and if repeated can affect their chances at a high pay order. Whenever the driver decline, uber offer that order with a few cents/dolar higher, then the cycle repeat until someone accept, uber pockets the difference, actual scam inflated price

I reach out to customer service via chat and I was told if I cannot produce a picture of the promotion that nothing can be done. A promotion that Uber eats put in app and I am been told if I cannot produce a picture of the promotion I will not get help. How fraudulent a company can you be. You put a promotion and you are asking me for a picture of the promotion you put up yourself. UBER EATS YOU ARE THIEVES!!!
name: Ijeoma

review: Uber Eats. Ok. I am actually tired of all the wrong orders being received. As the issue should be with the individual merchant this complaint against Uber Eats is because they penalize customers when merchants gets something wrong. To elaborate, recently, Jan 6, 2024 order placed and one item was not received, but rather a completely different item. A picture was taken and sent to UE. 1- Not only did they NOT respond within the 48 hrs but instead, 13 days later!, they said the food was picked up and no refund will be given. First, 13 days later is unacceptable. Second, the order was NEVER picked up. It was delivered. Third, how dare you penalize the customer and let the merchant just get away with getting the order wrong. This is wrong and flat out an unacceptable business model. More
name: Dorene

review: I ordered from Saks Donuts and they sent the wrong order and Uber refuse to reimburse me. I called Saks and she apologized and it was her fault and she would call Uber to let them know. They still won't refund.
name: Debra

review: I will NEVER EVER EVER order from Uber Eats EVER again.. Normally I only ever order from DoorDash which is already bad enough but at least they refund me when they mess up! My first time ordering off Uber Eats in a long time today & my food came super cold. I contacted support & they refused to give me a refund for the roll. This is RIDICULOUS. This is how y’all run a business? Yeah no wonder y’all are desperate for money. & y’all are gonna keep being desperate for money until y’all go out of business completely (: because that’s what happens when you treat paying customers like this. Disgusting. Do better. Or don’t, either way I won’t ever be ordering using Uber Eats ever again.
name: Sylvie

review: 1 star because I have to leave one. I placed two orders on 01/13/2024. One for my father and one for myself. The delivery took forever to come and when it did, I sent my daughter to retrieve the meals. She only came back inside with one and that meal wasn’t mine nor my father’s. I only ordered the second meal because we were hungry and already waited a long time for this order to arrive and I know it was the driver's fault. Customer support is no help and they hung up on me. They kept sending automated messages saying I couldn’t be refunded. So, they’re making me pay for meals from the first order that I never received (the incorrect order received was thrown away), but wanna thank me for being a member for 9 years. I’ll never use this again and I’m deleting all my family members accounts as well!
name: Dani

review: I guess Uber Eats isn’t making enough money. They told me that my order had been canceled so I resubmitted it. I ended up with two identical orders that came at once. It was cold out so I tipped $4 - he took 8. I reported the cancellation problem right away and they said tough and refused the refund even though I was in the 48 hour period. They were also rude. I’ve used the normal Uber since they started but am canceling my account. Imagine my surprise when I looked at reviews and saw they had done the exact same things to others. Double dipping.

review: I made an order for KFC and did not receive all my items. Uber Eats was unwilling to refund me my money for these items as they said I was ineligible for a refund. Mind you I only downloaded the app for this specific order. Horrible!
